Chordate:



Chordate received 3's message.  "Heh, like I'll fall for that." This Maximal 
knew it was already to easy to inflitrate the base, and that anyone would 
take advantage of the caring Maximals.  But Chordate had lost all interest in 
being good and kind.  

He activated the main comm. unit of the Cybertronian Fire.  "This is Chordate 
of the Cybertronian Fire.  Identify yourself and what you want.  You have 
less than thirty seconds to comply or I will fire upon you."

A beep alerted Chordate that ALL access codes, passwords, everything, had 
been changed and would be sent to the peopl with proper clearance according 
to rank.
